name: Love Wellness pH Balancing Cleanser | Feminine Vulva Wash for Intimate Health & Hygiene | Fragrance-Free, Non-Irritating & pH Matched | With Aloe Vera & Calendula for Sensitive Skin | 10 Fl Oz
short_description: PH BALANCING CLEANSER: This feminine wash gently cleans the vulva (the external genitalia) without disrupting the natural flora and pH levels in your body. 10 fl oz container.
HOW IT WORKS: Our doctor-developed feminine hygiene product matches acidic pH levels, unlike other washes, which may have a basic pH and can be harmful to sensitive skin.

CAREFULLY-SELECTED INGREDIENTS: Our intimate health cleanser for women is made with aloe vera and calendula, so it’s great for even the most sensitive of skin. No parabens, sulfates, or fragrances. Vegan and cruelty-free.
HOW TO USE: Apply pH Balancing Cleanser to wet skin in the shower or bath, then gently work into a lather and rinse clean. Can be used every time you wash.

ACTUALLY EFFECTIVE FEMCARE: At Love Wellness, we're committed to using real science and safe ingredients to raise the bar for women's health products. Our doctor-developed solutions for vaginal, gut, and hormonal health support your total body health. This is femcare, our way.
product_description: Love Wellness pH Balancing Cleanser is a feminine wash that gently cleans the vulva (the external genitalia) without disrupting the natural flora and pH levels in your body. Our OB/GYN-developed feminine hygiene product matches acidic pH levels, unlike other washes, which may have a basic pH and can be harmful to sensitive skin. It's made with aloe vera and calendula, so it’s great for even the most sensitive of skin. No parabens, sulfates, or fragrances. Vegan and cruelty-free. 10 fl oz container.

A daily intimate care routine that lets you experience that unique everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve feminine body wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin.
